snippet: Manager Eddie Howe has focused his Bournemouth training sessions on improving their defence this week as they prepare to face free-scoring Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic in the Premier League on Saturday....

headline.main: A Stylish Base in Paris for Exploring the Right Bank

lead_paragraph: Manager Eddie Howe has focused his Bournemouth training sessions on improving their defence this week as they prepare to face free-scoring Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic in the Premier League on Saturday.
